snippet: About a dozen members of Congress gathered in a Manhattan hotel as part of an effort by No Labels, a bipartisan citizens’ group, to find ways to make Washington more effective and even civil.
abstract: About a dozen members of Congress gather in a Manhattan hotel as part of an effort by bipartisan citizens’ group No Labels to find ways to make Washington more effective and civil.
lead_paragraph: About a dozen members of Congress gathered in a Manhattan hotel as part of an effort by No Labels, a bipartisan citizens’ group, to find ways to make Washington more effective and even civil.

headline.seo: No Labels Sponsors Meeting Aimed at Fixing Congress
headline.main: Group From Congress Asks, Why Does America Hate Us? (Answer: See Congress)
